discourse_list.title: Help design the Community development information architecture (card sort)

content.content: Hi everyone, we’re working on improving the Maker community portal. If you could spare 10-15 minutes to do a card sort exercise it would really help us out. You don’t have to be familiar with the current site – in fact, it helps if you’re not! All you need to do is follow this link: Welcome | Optimalsort by Optimal Workshop and then follow the instructions. There’s no right or wrong answers and it will give us some really great data to base our information architecture on. Thanks in advance.
